title: Mediterranean Luxury Cruise for Robert and Margaret Henderson
description: Fall Mediterranean cruise focusing on art, history, and cultural enrichment with mobility-friendly options

segments.notes:
Specific interests:
- Mobility-friendly tours with rest stops
- Art history lectures
- Butler service in Concierge-level suite
- October 2025 Mediterranean itinerary
- Flights from Miami in business class
segments.title: Regent Seven Seas Cruise Consultation
segments.agenda: Discuss Mediterranean cruise options, Concierge-level suite, mobility-friendly shore excursions, Vatican Museums tour, and onboard enrichment programs

segments.notes:
45th Wedding Anniversary Cruise
Preferred Suite: Voyager Master Suite
Special Accommodation Needs: Bathtub, elevator proximity, mobility assistance
segments.title: Regent Seven Seas Cruise Consultation - Henderson Anniversary Trip
segments.agenda:
Consultation Details:
1. Master Suite Selection (Voyager ship)
   - Midship elevator proximity
   - Bathtub requirement
   - Butler service options

2. Cruise Itinerary
   - October 2025 Mediterranean routes
   - Italy and Greece stops
   - Mobility-friendly shore excursions
   - Vatican Museums tour with rest stops

3. Onboard Experiences
   - Early dinner seating (6:00 PM)
   - Art history lecture series
   - Wine cellar and anniversary dinner wine pairing
   - 45th Wedding Anniversary special arrangements

4. Accessibility Considerations
   - Elevator access
   - Suite comfort for limited mobility
   - Tour modifications

Special Requests:
- Confirm Master Suite with bathtub
- Detailed wine pairing for anniversary dinner
- Proximity to midship elevators

segments.title: Business Class Flight Consultation - Henderson Anniversary Trip
segments.agenda:
Flight Consultation Details:
1. Business Class Flight Arrangements
   - Miami to Cruise Departure Port
   - Return Flight After Cruise

2. Seating Considerations
   - Maximum seat recline
   - Comfort for back issues
   - Aisle access
   - Carrier recommendations

3. Flight Timing
   - Optimal departure times
   - Minimal layovers
   - Arrival coordination with cruise schedule

Special Requests:
- Prioritize seat comfort
- Minimal travel stress
- Accommodation for limited mobility

segments.title: Regent Seven Seas Cruise Consultation
segments.agenda:
Detailed Mediterranean cruise planning:
- Master Suite selection on Voyager ship
- Bathtub-equipped suite near midship elevators
- Early 6:00 PM dinner seating
- Mobility-friendly shore excursions
- Art history lectures
- 45th Wedding Anniversary wine pairing dinner
- Vatican Museums specialized tour

segments.title: Business Class Flight and Pre-Cruise Hotel Consultation
segments.agenda:
Flight and Pre-Cruise Arrangements:
- Business class flight booking
- Comfortable seat selection considering mobility needs
- Airport to cruise port car service transfer
- Pre-cruise hotel stay (1 day early)
- Time zone adjustment accommodations
